Gemini 3 Flash is available in public preview to Copilot Enterprise, Copilot Business, Copilot Pro, and Copilot Pro+.

You’ll now be able to access the model in GitHub Copilot Chat on github.com, GitHub Mobile, Visual Studio Code, Visual Studio, JetBrains IDEs, Xcode, and Eclipse through the chat model picker (agent, ask, and edit modes). If you do not yet have access, please check again later.

## Availability in GitHub Copilot

This new model will be available to users in:

- Visual Studio versions 17.14.12 and later, 18.1.0 and later, all modes: chat, ask, edit, agent.
- GitHub Copilot for JetBrains versions 1.5.62 and later, in all modes: ask, edit, agent.
- GitHub Copilot for Xcode versions 0.46.0 and later in all modes: ask, agent.
- GitHub Copilot for Eclipse versions 0.14.0 and later in all modes: ask, agent.

## Enabling access

Copilot Business and Enterprise administrators must opt in by enabling the Gemini 3 Flash policy in Copilot settings. Once enabled, users in that organization will see **Gemini 3 Flash** in the model picker.

To learn more about the models available in Copilot, see [our documentation on models](https://docs.github.com/copilot/reference/ai-models/supported-models?utm_source=model-release-announcement&utm_medium=changelog&utm_campaign=newmodels) and get started with Copilot today.
